column1: '''Mythcon 13''' was the thirteenth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.
* '''Theme:''' "Celtic Con": The Celtic Influence on Fantasy Literature
* '''Guest of Honors:''' Nancy-Lou Patterson (keynote speaker), [[Marion Zimmer Bradley]], [[Tim Kirk]], Katherine Kurtz, Kathryn Lindskoog, Ataniel Noel, Paul Edwin Zimmer, [[Bernie Zuber]]
